software.name: subsonic
software.description:
Stream from your own computer.
Your media â€” your terms.
software.custom_start_script:
cd /home/app/

PULSE_SERVER=`netstat -nr |grep -e ^0.0| awk '{print $2}'`
export PULSE_SERVER
if ! test -h /home/fs/subsonic/home/transcode/ffmpeg
 then
 ln -fs /usr/bin/ffmpeg  /home/fs/subsonic/home/transcode/
 ln -fs /usr/bin/lame //home/fs/subsonic/home/transcode/
fi

java -Xmx_Engines_Builder(memory)m \
  -Dsubsonic.home=/home/fs/subsonic/home/ \
  -Dsubsonic.host=0.0.0.0 \
  -Dsubsonic.port=4040 \
  -Dsubsonic.httpsPort=0 \
  -Dsubsonic.contextPath=/ \
  -Dsubsonic.defaultMusicFolder=/home/fs/subsonic/music \
  -Dsubsonic.defaultPodcastFolder=/home/fs/subsonic/podcast \
  -Dsubsonic.defaultPlaylistFolder=/home/fs/subsonic/playlist \
  -Djava.awt.headless=true \
  -verbose:gc \
  -jar subsonic-booter-jar-with-dependencies.jar > /var/log/subsonic.log 2>&1 &
touch /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
PID_FILE=/tmp/subsonic.pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/trap.sh

while test 1 -ne 2
do
 sleep 200
done
rm /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
exit
software.installation_report_template:
Goto _Engines_Builder(http_protocol)://_Engines_Builder(fqdn)/
login as
username:admin
password:admin

Please be patient as Subsonic takes a few minutes to complete the installation  on first start

Please be patient as it takes a minute to start first time
